Description:
Detects the execution of the LaZagne. A utility used to retrieve multiple types of passwords stored on a local computer.
LaZagne has been leveraged multiple times by threat actors in order to dump credentials.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - LaZagne Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\lazagne.exe' or ((process_path like '%:\PerfLogs\%' or process_path like '%:\ProgramData\%' or process_path like '%:\Temp\%' or process_path like '%:\Tmp\%' or process_path like '%:\Windows\Temp\%' or process_path like '%\AppData\%' or process_path like '%\Downloads\%' or process_path like '%\Users\Public\%') and (command like '%.exe all' or command like '%.exe browsers' or command like '%.exe chats' or command like '%.exe databases' or command like '%.exe games' or command like '%.exe git' or command like '%.exe mails' or command like '%.exe maven' or command like '%.exe memory' or command like '%.exe multimedia' or command like '%.exe sysadmin' or command like '%.exe unused' or command like '%.exe wifi' or command like '%.exe windows')) or ((command like '%all %' or command like '%browsers %' or command like '%chats %' or command like '%databases %' or command like '%games %' or command like '%git %' or command like '%mails %' or command like '%maven %' or command like '%memory %' or command like '%multimedia %' or command like '%php %' or command like '%svn %' or command like '%sysadmin %' or command like '%unused %' or command like '%wifi %' or command like '%windows %') and (command like '%-oA%' or command like '%-oJ%' or command like '%-oN%' or command like '%-output%' or command like '%-password%' or command like '%-1Password%' or command like '%-apachedirectorystudio%' or command like '%-autologon%' or command like '%-ChromiumBased%' or command like '%-composer%' or command like '%-coreftp%' or command like '%-credfiles%' or command like '%-credman%' or command like '%-cyberduck%' or command like '%-dbvis%' or command like '%-EyeCon%' or command like '%-filezilla%' or command like '%-filezillaserver%' or command like '%-ftpnavigator%' or command like '%-galconfusion%' or command like '%-gitforwindows%' or command like '%-hashdump%' or command like '%-iisapppool%' or command like '%-IISCentralCertP%' or command like '%-kalypsomedia%' or command like '%-keepass%' or command like '%-keepassconfig%' or command like '%-lsa_secrets%' or command like '%-mavenrepositories%' or command like '%-memory_dump%' or command like '%-Mozilla%' or command like '%-mRemoteNG%' or command like '%-mscache%' or command like '%-opensshforwindows%' or command like '%-openvpn%' or command like '%-outlook%' or command like '%-pidgin%' or command like '%-postgresql%' or command like '%-psi-im%' or command like '%-puttycm%' or command like '%-pypykatz%' or command like '%-Rclone%' or command like '%-rdpmanager%' or command like '%-robomongo%' or command like '%-roguestale%' or command like '%-skype%' or command like '%-SQLDeveloper%' or command like '%-squirrel%' or command like '%-tortoise%' or command like '%-turba%' or command like '%-UCBrowser%' or command like '%-unattended%' or command like '%-vault%' or command like '%-vaultfiles%' or command like '%-vnc%' or command like '%-windows%' or command like '%-winscp%' or command like '%-wsl%')))
